perturbation.original_text: 10.10 Applicable Law and Disputes. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Arizona applicable to agreements fully executed and performed therein. Any claims arising hereunder or relating hereto shall be prosecuted only in the appropriate court or the State of Arizona or in the applicable United States District Court and neither party shall make any claim or demand in any other jurisdiction forum. Each party waives its right to a trial by jury and agrees to the jurisdiction of the judge in the appropriate court as governed by the State of Arizona. The parties consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts and to the service of process by mail.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.10 Applicable Law and Disputes. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Arizona applicable to agreements fully executed and performed therein. Any claims arising hereunder or relating hereto shall be prosecuted only in a mutually agreed upon forum, and each party agrees to the jurisdiction of the judge in the agreed upon court as governed by its agreed upon rules. The parties consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts and to the service of process by mail.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause specifies Arizona courts and waives jury trial rights. The modified version replaces this with a vague 'mutually agreed upon forum' for dispute resolution. This creates a legal contradiction because it voids the specific Arizona jurisdiction and the jury trial waiver from the agreement, making the actual method of resolution uncertain and unenforceable.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Arizona state law regarding contract enforceability and dispute resolution.

perturbation.changed_text:
4.2 Compensation for Rights and Services. TDA agrees to pay Smith, as a consideration for the Rights and Services.

      1)    25,000 Restricted common shares of TDA,

            a.    As of the date of this agreement, Company has sold stock at                   $2.50/share.

            b.    Par Value is $.0001 per share.

      2)    25% royalty of net TDA net sales price, which may or may not be paid at the discretion of TDA.

      3)    Option to convert annual royalties to TDA common stock at a $10 of             stock for every $1 of Royalty converted.

            a.    TDA stock conversion price based on the previous six month                   average daily price

            b.    Option is limited to 50% of TDA outstanding stock and if the                   option is exercised, it must be exercised when the agreement     &sbsp;             is in effect.
perturbation.explanation: The change adds the phrase 'which may or may not be paid at the discretion of TDA' to the royalty payment clause. This directly contradicts the nature of a contract as a binding agreement, making the compensation terms ambiguous and potentially unenforceable. A promise to pay that is optional is not legally binding.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Basic contract law principle of 'consideration,' requiring mutual obligation.

perturbation.original_text: 9.1 By TDA. TDA shall indemnify and hold harmless Smith, Smith's agent, and Smith's heirs, executors and legal representatives from and against any and all damages, costs, judgments, penalties and expenses of any kind (including reasonable legal fees and disbursements) which may be obtained against, imposed upon or suffered by any of them as a result of (a) any claims or representations made by Smith in any Advertising Materials produced or used by TDA hereunder, (b) TDA's default, breach, negligence, errors and/or misconduct hereunder, and/or (c) any claim arising from any third party's use or association with TDA;s products.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.1 By TDA. TDA shall indemnify and hold harmless Smith, Smith's agent, and Smith's heirs, executors and legal representatives from and against any and all damages, costs, judgments, penalties and expenses of any kind (including reasonable legal fees and disbursements) which may be obtained against, imposed upon or suffered by any of them as a result of (a) any claims or representations made by Smith in any Advertising Materials produced or used by TDA hereunder if Smith does not object to the content of such advertising, (b) TDA's default, breach, negligence, errors and/or misconduct hereunder, and/or (c) any claim arising from any third party's use or association with TDA;s products.
perturbation.explanation: The addition of 'if Smith does not object to the content of such advertising' introduces a contradiction. The clause initially states TDA will indemnify Smith for claims arising from advertising materials. The modified text means Smith is only indemnified if they don't object to the potentially harmful advertising, effectively creating a circumstance where Smith may want to prevent a claim to arise by objecting, but they also prevent TDA from indemnifying them. By Smith taking action to prevent the claim, they don't have any claim to seek TDA's indemnity. The legal obligation now depends on Smith's choices.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles relating to indemnity and duty to mitigate damages.
